Brand: Pacifica

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment
book: 2587-Pacifica Super Flower Rapid Response Face Oil (2019 formulation)

chunk: Ingredients: HELIANTHUS ANNUUS (SUNFLOWER) SEED OIL, CARTHAMUS TINCTORIUS (SAFFLOWER) SEED OIL, SIMMONDSIA CHINENSIS (JOJOBA) SEED OIL, TANACETUM ANNUUM (BLUE TANSY) LEAF OIL, ROSA CANINA FRUIT OIL, ARGANIA SPINSOSA (ARGAN) OIL, TOCOPHEROL ACETATE (VITAMIN E), ROSA CENTIFOLIA FLOWER (ROSE) EXTRACT, PARFUM (NATURAL).
book: 2587-Pacifica Super Flower Rapid Response Face Oil (2019 formulation)

chunk: Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
